Articles.Content:
See http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132468-Problem-with-orbit-prediction

Next conic not displayed, unless you go to space center and come back to ship.

Same problem again and again.

This time it was during a mission to Tylo.

I sent my ship in 2 parts (lander + main ship). After I assembled them on LKO, only the blue conic was shown. Weird things were happening with A/D nodes too, when leaving to Jool.

Unplayable, until you leave to space center and come back.
Hi gogozerg, can you please see the stickied support thread and provide your KSP.log, output_log.txt and dxdiag report, thank you.

EDIT: Ignore this.

Edited September 5, 2015 by Alshain
He has this issue with a stock install so I think it's fine here, but I do need those logs.

He has this issue with a stock install so I think it's fine here, but I do need those logs.

Oh, sorry. That's what I get for not reading all the way down lol. Nevermind, ignore my last post.
